definitions.definition: Of a geologic era within the Phanerozoic eon that comprises the Triassic , Jurassic and Cretaceous periods from about 230 to 65 million years ago, when life on earth was dominated by reptiles .

main_definition: ( geology ) Of a geologic era within the Phanerozoic eon that comprises the Triassic , Jurassic and Cretaceous periods from about 230 to 65 million years ago, when life on earth was dominated by reptiles .
